促音: (そくおん) - assimilated sound (small "tsu" in Japanese); geminate consonant
促音便: (そくおんびん) - nasal sound change (generation of geminate consonant, primarily a geminate 't' from vowel stems ending in 'i')
俄: (が) - Repentino, súbito, abrupto, inesperado, improvisado, apressado, de improviso
俄か: (にわか) - sudden/abrupt/unexpected/improvised/hasty/offhand; (sometimes 仁輪加 )  impromptu skit
俄仕立て: (にわかじたて) - extemporary; improvised; extemporaneous
俄然: (がぜん) - suddenly; all of a sudden; abruptly
俄狂言: (にわかきょうげん) - impromptu skit; (theatrical) farce; extravaganza
俄盲: (にわかめくら) - sudden blindness; one suddenly blinded
俊彦: (しゅんげん) - gifted man; accomplished man
俊才: (しゅんさい) - prodigy; talented person; person of exceptional talent; genius
俊敏: (しゅんびん) - quick-witted and agile; keen and nimble
俊豪: (しゅんごう) - talent; man of outstanding learning and virtue
俊足: (shunsoku) - corredor rápido; cavalo veloz, corcel ágil, corredor rápido; cavalo veloz, corcel ágil; pessoa talentosa, pessoa brilhante
俎の鯉: (まないたのこい) - confronted with a hopeless situation; about to be cut off (e.g. in a battle) and unable to do anything
俎上: (そじょう) - on the chopping board
俎板の鯉: (まないたのこい) - confronted with a hopeless situation; about to be cut off (e.g. in a battle) and unable to do anything
俏す: (やつす) - to be absorbed in/to lose oneself to; to disguise oneself as/to adorn oneself
俐巧: (りこう) - clever/intelligent/wise/bright/sharp/sensible/smart/shrewd; (usu. as お利口)  well-behaved (of kids, animals, etc)/obedient/good; good (with words)
俗: (zoku) - vulgar , layman (especialmente em oposição a um monge budista), laity, man of the world, the world; local manners, modern customs; common, popular; vulgar, low
俗に言う: (ぞくにいう) - commonly referred to as ...
俗世間: (ぞくせけん) - this world; secular society; workaday world; this life
俗了: (ぞくりょう) - vulgarization; refined thing becoming vulgar
俗事: (ぞくじ) - worldly affairs/daily routine; popular usage
俗人: (ぞくじん) - ordinary people; layman; worldling
俗伝: (ぞくでん) - popular belief or saying
俗体: (ぞくたい) - condition of the laity
俗務: (ぞくむ) - secular affairs; worldly cares; daily routine
俗化: (ぞっか) - vulgarization; vulgarisation; secularization; secularisation; popularization; popularisation
俗名: (ぞくめい) - common name; popular name; secular name; bad reputation
俗向き: (ぞくむき) - appealing to the public; popular
俗塵: (ぞくじん) - the world; earthly affairs
俗姓: (ぞくせい) - secular surname (of a priest)
俗学: (ぞくがく) - popular learning; worldly study
俗形: (ぞくぎょう) - the figure of the common man
俗念: (ぞくねん) - worldliness; worldly ambition; unholy desires
俗才: (ぞくさい) - worldly wisdom; practical wisdom
俗文体: (ぞくぶんたい) - text written using colloquial language; text written using everyday language
俗楽: (ぞくがく) - (ant: 雅楽) popular music; common people's music (as opposed to court music)
俗歌: (ぞっか) - popular song; folk song; ditty; ballad
俗気芬々: (ぞくけふんぷん) - (yoji) of low (vulgar) taste; lacking class
俗気芬芬: (ぞくけふんぷん) - (yoji) of low (vulgar) taste; lacking class
俗流: (ぞくりゅう) - populace; common run of men; worldly customs
俗物: (ぞくぶつ) - worldly-minded person; vulgar person; philistine; snob; vulgar and ostentatious person.
俗物根性: (ぞくぶつこんじょう) - (yoji) snobbery; snobbishness; philistinism; vulgar and ostentatious nature (disposition)
俗界: (ぞっかい) - secular life; workaday world
俗神道: (ぞくしんとう) - Folk Shinto (term used by Reform Shintoists to refer to sects of syncretized Shinto)
俗称: (ぞくしょう) - common name; popular name
